title: Reprimanding an employee
context: Strictly tell a worker that their performance is unacceptable.

content.bestLine: Your performance is unacceptable and needs improvement immediately

neutral.text: We need to discuss your performance
Your work is not meeting expectations
I'm concerned about your recent performance
We need to see significant improvement

I want to help you improve your performance

formal.text: Your performance has been deemed unsatisfactory
I am writing to inform you of performance concerns

Your work has not met the expected standards
We will be monitoring your performance closely
I expect to see significant improvement immediately
